p: The growth of all gram-negative bacteria was inhibited by Salvia mirzayani essential oil at the concentration range of 64 to 128 μL/mL (MIC), except for Shigella flexneri NCTC 8516 and Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 16 μL/mL). For gram-negative bacteria, the MBCs were the same for each given bacteria (≥128 μL/mL) except for third-generation cephalosporin-sensitive Escherichia coli (64 ≥ 128 μL/mL) and Shigella flexneri NCTC 8516 (32 μL/mL).
